1)
a) -128 127
b) 0 255

2) 
a) -127 127
b) -127 127
c) -128 127

3)
64, -64 in 2's complement
64 = 01000000
-64 = 11000000

4)
36, -36 in 2's complement
36 = 00100100
-36 = 11011011

5)

2's compliment, binary arithmetic

64 + 36
64 = 01000000
36 = 00100100
xx = 01100100

64 - 36
+64 = 01000000
-36 = 11011011
?xx = 10000111

-64 + 36
-64 = 11000000
+36 = 00100100
?xx = 11100100

-64 - 36
-64 = 11000000
-36 = 11011011
?xx = 10011011

6)
0x7B 2's = 123
0xA5 2's = -95
123 - 95 = 28

0x7B = 01111011
0xA5 = 10100101
?xx  = 00101000
?xx = 28!!!
